name: Target: Hive'Regal Slavemakers
tooltip:
Target: Hive'Regal SlavemakersLevel 60

Kill 30 Hive'Regal Slavemakers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Hive'Regal Slavemaker x 30
